DOC.brief_summary: This observational, prospective, multicenter study will describe the mean dose of Mircera (methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta) and the hemoglobin levels in patients with chronic kidney disease. Patients are not on dialysis and are naive to, or have received erythropoiesis stimulating agent treatment. Data will be collected for 10 months.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Mircera (Methoxy Polyethylene Glycol-epoetin Beta) in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Not On Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Adults patients, >/=18 years of age Presence of chronic kidney disease (Stage 34) Participation in another clinical study
